columns.Region_ID: The unique identifier for each region.
columns.Date: The date associated with the region's record.
columns.Label: The label or brand linked to the region.
columns.Format: The format of the media associated with the region.
columns.Catalogue: The catalogue number for identifying the media.

region.table_description: The table stores details about various regions and their properties.

columns.Party_ID: The unique identifier for each political party.
columns.Minister: The name of the minister representing the party.
columns.Took_office: The year the party came to power.
columns.Left_office: The year the party left power.
columns.Region_ID: The identifier for the region associated with the party.
columns.Party_name: The name of the political party.

party.table_description: The table lists details about political parties and their leadership.

columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member.
columns.Member_Name: The full name of the member.
columns.Party_ID: The identifier for the party the member belongs to.
columns.In_office: The tenure period during which the member was in office.

member.table_description: The table captures details about members of political parties.

columns.Event_ID: The unique identifier for each party event.
columns.Event_Name: The name of the event organized by the party.
columns.Party_ID: The identifier for the party hosting the event.
columns.Member_in_charge_ID: The identifier for the member overseeing the event.

party_events.table_description: The table records details about events organized by political parties.
